title: Toronto JS Lightning Talk Event [in person]
details:
Details
-------

\# **Toronto Js Lightning Talk Event**

After a three year hiatus, we‚Äôre back with another Lightning Talk event at **[Super.com](http://Super.com)!** üëã! Tonight we‚Äôll feature **10 speakers**, each doing a **10-15 minute talk** about a variety of topics. Also, there‚Äôs pizza!

This event is open to all skill levels.

**FEAURING**  
"**Develop Web Applications with Modern Angular**" by Dale Nguyen  
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/dalenguyenblogger/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dalenguyenblogger/)

"**The web can do that?!**" By Marco Campos  
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/madcampos/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/madcampos/)

"**Dating in different timezones**" by Danny Kim  
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/0916dhkim/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/0916dhkim/)

"**Open API in all its swagger**" by Yuri Yang  
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/07yuri/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/07yuri/)

"**How JS applications are built and deployed at Stripe**" by Michael Humiston  
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelhumiston/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelhumiston/)

"**Accessibility isn‚Äôt just for users: Creating engaging technical presentations with accessibility in mind**‚Äù by Elizabeth McCready  
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/elizabethmccready/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/elizabethmccready/)

"**My Journey of Building a Figma Widget with the Notion API**‚Äù by Suhyeong Lee  
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/suhyeong-evan-lee/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/suhyeong-evan-lee/)

"**Stop narrowing the browser window: improve testing for responsiveness**‚Äù by Jen Chan  
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/jennifer7chan/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jennifer7chan/)

"**Deploy your own LLM, local or on-cloud**‚Äù by Hardik Raj Hajela  
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/hardik-hajela/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jennifer7chan/)

**"Why would you write a library? The value of building things from scratch"** by Kaung Zin Hein  
[https://www.linkedin.com/in/kaung-zin-hein-4284a2258/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kaung-zin-hein-4284a2258/)

**Stay tuned for more speakers and topics!**  
Your hosts, Sami, Aman & Evert

\## **Schedule:**

**6:00 PM** - doors "open"  
**6:30 PM** - Lightning Talks begin  
**8:30 PM** - Networking time  
**9:00 PM** - everyone goes "home"  
(Note: All times in the schedule are an approximation.)  
**Many thanks to [Super.com](http://Super.com) for hosting us!**

We're looking for sponsors for events like these. If you or your company would like to support TorontoJS and get a message out to our community, please get in touch with \[[organizers@torontojs.com](http://organizers@torontojs.com)\]([mailto:organizers@torontojs.com](http://mailto:organizers@torontojs.com))

The [Code of Conduct](https://torontojs.com/p/code_of_conduct) is enforced at all TorontoJS events and spaces - online or in-person.

Gendered toilets and a single occupancy accessible toilet are available.  
TorontoJS is a volunteer-led not-for-profit organization. Please help us with tidying up; otherwise, the venue staff and volunteers will have to pick up after you.
